page.title: 07EDUCATION-COMMUNITY LINKS
page.content: To help our local community our cook does "meals-on-wheels" service which helps the elderly in the village. Children under five can attend a play group daily in a spare classroom. Our school hall is used for lots of clubs nd other activites after school. Our school has a Parents Teachers Association. They raise a lot of money to help us by having jumble sales and fetes. They come in sometimes to hear us read. They also come in and give us transport on our outings. On Tuesday they supervise us when we go swimming. At Christmas they provide food and prizes and help with our parties. They help us with our discos and on Sports Days. They buy us extra epuipment to make our school better for us.
